data.name: Ghost-Spider
data.description: Ghost-Spider hails from a universe where Gwen Stacy was bitten by a radioactive spider. She's an agile Web-Warrior that can prevent enemies from using their abilities.

starItems.name: Ghost-Spider
starItems.description: Ghost-Spider hails from a universe where Gwen Stacy was bitten by a radioactive spider. She's an agile Web-Warrior that can prevent enemies from using their abilities.

1.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> from primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

2.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> from primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

3.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> from primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

4.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> from primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

5.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> from primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Always gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>

6.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> from primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Damage + gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if the primary target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

7.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> from primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> Damage + gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if the primary target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>. Chain up to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to each target.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>. Chain up to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to each target.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> or Spider-Man (Miles) ally

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>. Chain up to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to each target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> or Spider-Man (Miles) ally.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to each target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> or Spider-Man (Miles) ally.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> Crit Chance to primary target

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage with +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Crit Chance + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to each target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> or Spider-Man (Miles) ally.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage with +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Crit Chance + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to each target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> or Spider-Man (Miles) ally.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color>-<color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage with +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Crit Chance + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color>-<color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to each target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> or Spider-Man (Miles) ally.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from all enemies.

This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all targets
Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from the primary target to all secondary targets

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage. Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, from the primary target to all secondary targets.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from all enemies.

This attack cannot be blocked.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage. Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, from the primary target to all secondary targets.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from all enemies.

This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all targets
Spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from the primary target to all secondary targets

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. Spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, from the primary target to all secondary targets.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from all enemies.

This attack cannot be blocked.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage. Spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, from the primary target to all secondary targets.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from all enemies.

This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all targets
Spread <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from the primary target to all secondary targets

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage. Spread <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, from the primary target to all secondary targets.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from all enemies.

This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all targets
Spread all negative effects from the primary target to all secondary targets

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage. Spread all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, from the primary target to all secondary targets.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from all enemies.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
When an ally Spider-Man (Miles) or a <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character.

When an enemy attacks this character, a <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> ally, or a <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> and <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage.
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies.
 > On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>5</color> random <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies or self that were not at full energy.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> and <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage

2.description:
When an ally Spider-Man (Miles) or a <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character.

When an enemy attacks this character, a <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> ally, or a <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> and <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies.
 > On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>5</color> random <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies or self that were not at full energy.

3.description:
When an ally Spider-Man (Miles) or a <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character.

When an enemy attacks this character, a <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> ally, or a <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Dodge Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> and <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies.
 > On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>5</color> random <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies or self that were not at full energy.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> and <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage

4.description:
When an ally Spider-Man (Miles) or a <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character.

When an enemy attacks this character, a <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> ally, or a <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Dodge Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> and <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies.
 > On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>5</color> random <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies or self that were not at full energy.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge Chance
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage

5.description:
When an ally Spider-Man (Miles) or a <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character.

When an enemy attacks this character, a <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> ally, or a <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Dodge Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
 > <color=#fff568>WEB-WARRIOR</color> and <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies.
 > On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>5</color> random <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies or self that were not at full energy.
